full_summary:
_____________________________
**The Government of Canada - Purchase of Building Construction Management Services for Royal Canadian Mint (RCM)**
=============================

**Solicitation Details**
--------------------

| Item Key                        | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **Tender Reference Number**      | WS4003442184-Doc4024026594                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **Publicilation Date**           | May 24, 2023                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| **Closing Date**                 | June 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| **Procurement Method**           | Competitive, Open Bidding                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| **Selection Criteria**           | Lowest Price                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| **Postponed Response Deadline**  | Yes, disregard the stated deadline and post response by June 27 at 2 PM EST. Any bids received after the deadline will be marked as non-respondent.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **Address of Property**          | National Capital Region (NCR))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

**Encumbrance**
--------------

This procurement demands a mandatory security requirement. A valid Designated Organisational Screening (DOS) must be held at the closing of the bid(s). Failure to comply with this doctrine is considered non-conforming.

There is also an additional site visit scheduled for June 13, 2023, at 11:30 AM. Interested bidders must first meet at the security entrance (320 Sussex) where they will be escorted to the designated check-in area. All individuals participating in the site visit need to be cleared beforehand.

**Submissions**
--------------

Interested participants must submit their inquiries to the sponsoring authority with at most 5 business days' prior attention. 

Application of Purchase
----------------------

Interested parties who intend to perform this service should access that information at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16379790?extsite=MTYzNzk3OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== within the set timeframe. No further applications need to be send.

**Key Amended Part**
-------------------


| Amened Times      | 13683 MDT  https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html?iso=2023-06-13T11:30:00Z&p1=gmt0&p2=iso%3AUTC%2C+-07%3A00                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------
